ui_about_rate_desc.message: Do you like this extension? Take a minute to give a positive review on the Chrome Web Store.

ui_about_share1.message: Do you like Awesome New Tab Page? Why not share it with friends and family?

ui_apps_tip_message.message: Nice! You just installed an app. You can find all of your installed apps here.

ui_button_lock.message: Lock to Interact with Apps & Widgets

ui_config_advanced_disable_horizontal_sc.message: Enables horizontal scrolling. Disable to use vertical scrolling.

ui_config_advanced_grid_height_tip.message: Overrides automatic grid generation. Using this setting may result in your tiles not being loaded. Setting this value too large may impact performance. Min: 3. Max: 25. Erase number to disable!

ui_config_advanced_grid_width_tip.message: Overrides automatic grid generation. Using this setting may result in your tiles not being loaded. Setting this value too large may impact performance. Min: 4. Max: 50. Erase number to disable!

ui_config_advanced_hide_rctm.message: Enable the Recently Closed Tab Menu

ui_config_advanced_hide_rctm_tip.message: Enables the Recently Closed Tab Menu in the top left. Disable to hide the icon and stop logging closed tabs.

ui_config_advanced_tip.message: Below are advanced options that, if used improperly, can lead to a degraded user experience. Use the following options at your own risk.

ui_config_bgimg1.message: Advanced (Shorthand Background CSS): Use an image on the web.

ui_config_bgimg3.message: Erase the box to use the default background (solid color).

ui_config_hide_scrollbar_tip.message: Shows the scrollbar at the bottom of the page.

ui_config_reset_desc.message: This button will allow you to undo all changes you've made to Awesome New Tab Page.

ui_config_shgrid_desc.message: When disabled, the grid will only be visible when the grid is unlocked.

ui_config_shtlb_desc.message: When disabled, the top left buttons will slide out of the way. To access them again, simply mouse over where they normally were.

ui_confirm_reset.message: Are you sure you want to reset widget, app, and custom shortcut placements, stock widget preferences (notepad, etc.), and background preferences? Any customizations will be irrevocably lost.

ui_confirm_uninstall.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall $app$?

ui_drag_widget_message.message: To place a widget, click and drag the widget to an empty tile.

ui_faw_get_more_apps_body.message: Get more apps from the Chrome Web Store.

ui_faw_unlock_drag_apps.message: Unlock the grid and drag your installed apps to an empty slot.

ui_faw_unlock_drag_widgets.message: Unlock the grid and drag your installed widgets to an empty slot.

ui_import_export_confirm_restore.message: Are you sure you want to restore? Your current settings would be lost.

ui_import_export_desc.message: Take your settings to other browsers or restore a backup.

ui_import_export_desc_export.message: Export: Generates a string that contains all of your preferences. This string can be saved for later as a backup or can be copied to other computers to automatically set them up like this one. Uploaded images are not exported; images on the web are.

ui_import_export_desc_import.message: Import: Overwrites your current configuration with a valid exported string. WARNING: All of your current preferences will be irrevocably lost. There is no way to undo this operation. Uploaded images are not imported; images on the web are.

ui_import_export_desc_restore.message: Restore: Allows you to undo the last Import. Your current state will be backed up for later restoration as well.

ui_import_export_installed_warning.message: Installed apps, extensions, and widgets are not imported or exported. Extensions can't install other apps or extensions. Use Chrome Sync instead.

ui_online_backup_backup_already_exist.message: A backup with this name already exist. Please type a unique database name.

ui_online_backup_confirm_delete_backup.message: Are you sure you want to remove the backup? Once removed, you won't be able to recover it.

ui_online_backup_confirm_load_backup.message: Do you want to import this backup? If you import the backup, your current settings would be lost.

ui_online_backup_invalid_backup_name.message: Backup name should be atleast one character long.

ui_online_backup_sync_size_exceeded.message: Too large to be stored in online storage.

ui_online_backup_sync_writes_exceeded.message: You've exceeded maximum write operations limit per minute. Please try again in a few seconds.

ui_online_backups_desc.message: Online backups are stored using the Chrome Storage API and have a limited space of 100KB. You can access these backups over multiple computers which are logged in with same Google Chrome account. Learn how to sign in to Chrome.

ui_online_backups_warning.message: Important: You need to be signed in to Google Chrome using the same account to synchronize backups online. If you are not signed in, these backups will be stored offline, only on this computer. Images uploaded directly to the extension are not backed up.

ui_screenshot_confirm.message: In order to capture the screenshot, the website will be opened in a new tab. After the page has finished loading, the tab will automatically close and you'll be returned to Awesome New Tab Page. Please don't close or navigate away. This shouldn't take but a few seconds.

ui_screenshot_permission_denied.message: You declined to grant Awesome New Tab Page the permission necessary to allow it to capture screenshots. If you wish to take a screenshot, please try again and grant Awesome New Tab Page the necessary permission.

ui_te_app_tip.message: Not all options are available for apps. If you'd like to get more options, create a custom shortcut instead. Simply click on an empty tile with the grid unlocked.

ui_te_bg_note.message: Note: This option has no effect on the Icon & Background settings.

ui_te_bg_tip.message: Tip: If you check this box, you may also want to hide the name and favicon.

ui_te_ib_advanced.message: Advanced: Hide the name and favicon and use an image that's 200px by 200px to completely customize a 1x1 tile.

ui_te_ib_desc.message: Enter a web URL to an image, use the browse button, or drag & drop an image above to change the icon.

ui_te_ib_tip.message: Tip: Leave blank for no icon.

ui_te_name_desc.message: What do you want to call it?

ui_te_newtab.message: Open in New Tab on left click

ui_te_search_desc.message: Enter a search URL for this website. For example:

ui_te_url_desc.message: Enter the URL you'd like to link to, such as http://www.google.com/

ui_te_url_tip.message: Tip: A valid URL contains a protocol - such as "http://" - before the domain. Without a valid protocol, your shortcut will not work.

ui_tutorial2_app_drawer.message: Here you'll find all of the apps that you've installed from the Chrome Web Store. You can drag apps out of this window onto your unlocked grid. You can also uninstall apps from this window.

ui_tutorial2_completed_string.message: Like, really awesome. Now you know how to use Awesome New Tab Page to get the most out of your Chrome experience. So what are you going to do next?

ui_tutorial2_delete_widget_string.message: The grid is yours to customize as you see fit. You can remove tiles you don't want. Go ahead and delete the tutorial widget.

ui_tutorial2_empty_grid_string.message: Why be limited to apps found on the Chrome Web Store? Click on this empty grid tile to create a custom shortcut to anywhere on the web.

ui_tutorial2_lock_grid.message: Locking and unlocking the grid allows you to place, move, and remove widgets, apps, and custom shortcuts. Click the padlock to continue.

ui_tutorial2_main_click.message: Click that tiny little button down there to get going.

ui_tutorial2_main_feels.message: You just upgraded to awesome. How does it feel?

ui_tutorial2_main_getstarted.message: Maybe a little too much awesome all at once? Don't worry, the tutorial widget will help you get started.

ui_tutorial2_widget_drawer.message: Here you'll find installed widgets made by third-party developers specifically designed for Awesome New Tab Page. Widgets bring dynamic and useful information right to your new tab page.
